verses.roman:
ṣaṣṭhe-sārvabhaumera karilā uddhāra
saptame-tīrtha-yātrā, vāsudeva nistāra

synonyms: ṣaṣṭhe—in the Sixth Chapter; sārvabhaumera—Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya; karilā uddhāra—the Lord delivered; saptame—in the Seventh Chapter; tīrtha-yātrā—going to different holy places; vāsudeva nistāra—delivering Vāsudeva.
translation: In the Sixth Chapter I have told how Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya was delivered, and in the Seventh Chapter I have described the Lord's tour of different holy places and His deliverance of Vāsudeva.
